name: Full metal toy
description:
Full metal toys is a solo 2d top down shooter.

An other war explode in the army men universe ! Two squad of soldier: Alpha soldier and Bravo soldier fight for the control of the house playing room. Choose your soldier class, map, game mod, damage mod, the number of soldier and go to toys battleground.

This is a prototype of this game, check the READ ME to know how to play

Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/k4dNGK
